announcements.title: Scholarship Opportunity
announcements.description: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, you will have the chance to apply and participate in the event.
announcements.extraInfo: This is your chance to enhance your learning experience by securing this scholarship. Be sure to prepare ahead and take part in this amazing opportunity.
announcements.strongText: Mark your calendars and get ready to participate! Good luck!

steps.title: How to Apply for the Scholarship
steps.description: To participate in the scholarship event, follow these simple steps:

list.title: Step 1: Visit the Scholarship Page
list.description: Navigate to the scholarship page by clicking on the dedicated scholarship card on the homepage.

list.title: Step 2: Fill Out the Application Form
list.description: Complete all required fields in the application form, ensuring accuracy in your submission.

list.title: Step 3: Submit Your Application
list.description: Click the submit button to finalize your application. You'll receive a confirmation email once it's successfully submitted.

announcements.title: Weekly Contest
announcements.description: Join our weekly contest for a chance to win exciting prizes! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, test your skills and compete with other participants.
announcements.extraInfo: The contest includes a series of challenging questions designed to test your knowledge and quick thinking. Do you have what it takes to win?
announcements.strongText: Prepare yourself and don't miss out on this opportunity! Good luck!

steps.title: Starting the Weekly Contest
steps.description: To participate in the weekly contest, follow these steps:

list.title: Step 1: Visit the Home Page
list.description: Navigate to the main page of our website and locate the 'Weekly Contest' card.

list.title: Step 2: Click on the Weekly Contest Card
list.description: Once you find the card labeled 'Weekly Contest,' click on it to be directed to the contest page.

list.title: Step 3: Follow the Instructions
list.description: On the contest page, carefully read the instructions and complete the contest within the allotted time.

announcements.title: New Feature Release: Interactive Quizzes
announcements.description: We're thrilled to announce the release of our new interactive quiz feature! This will provide a more engaging and immersive learning experience for all users.
announcements.extraInfo: The interactive quizzes are designed to help you track your learning progress and improve your retention of key concepts.
announcements.strongText: Get ready to test your knowledge with fun and challenging quizzes!

steps.title: How to Access Interactive Quizzes
steps.description: Follow these steps to start using the interactive quiz feature:

list.title: Step 1: Navigate to Your Dashboard
list.description: Log in to your account and visit your dashboard where you'll see the 'Interactive Quiz' section.

list.title: Step 2: Select a Quiz Topic
list.description: Choose a topic from the list of available quizzes to get started.

list.title: Step 3: Complete the Quiz
list.description: Answer the questions in the quiz. Once you're done, you'll receive immediate feedback on your performance.

announcements.title: Exclusive Webinar Invitation
announcements.description: We are pleased to invite you to an exclusive webinar where experts from various fields will discuss trending topics. This is a great opportunity for you to gain insights and ask questions in real time.
announcements.extraInfo: This webinar is open to all registered members. Make sure to secure your spot by registering in advance!
announcements.strongText: Don't miss out on this amazing learning opportunity! Register now!

steps.title: How to Register for the Webinar
steps.description: To join the webinar, follow these steps:

list.title: Step 1: Visit the Webinar Page
list.description: Go to the webinar page by clicking the link provided in the invitation email or from the main website.

list.title: Step 2: Fill Out the Registration Form
list.description: Enter your details in the registration form and confirm your participation.

list.title: Step 3: Attend the Webinar
list.description: On the day of the event, click the provided link to join the live session.

announcements.title: New Course Available: Advanced JavaScript
announcements.description: We are excited to introduce our new Advanced JavaScript course! This course is designed to deepen your understanding of JavaScript, covering advanced concepts and techniques.
announcements.extraInfo: Whether you're looking to enhance your existing skills or learn new techniques, this course is perfect for you!
announcements.strongText: Enroll today and take your JavaScript knowledge to the next level!

steps.title: How to Enroll in the Course
steps.description: To start the course, follow these steps:

list.title: Step 1: Log in to Your Account
list.description: Access your account and navigate to the 'Courses' section.

list.title: Step 2: Find the Advanced JavaScript Course
list.description: Scroll through the available courses and select 'Advanced JavaScript.'

list.title: Step 3: Click 'Enroll'
list.description: Click the 'Enroll' button to join the course and start learning.
